summary: Provides a collection of API endpoints that allow external systems to import bibliographic data and cover images into Open Library, retrieve and match Internet Archive records, search for existing records via library identifiers, and create new Open Library entries when authorized, handling various data formats (MARC, RDF, OPDS) and returning standardized responses.
business_intent: Facilitate integration of external catalog sources such as the Internet Archive and library management systems (e.g., Koha) with Open Library, enabling automated metadata ingestion, cover image handling, and record lookup/creation to enrich the Open Library catalog while enforcing authentication and error reporting.
